item.description:
@system wrote:

i have nearly finished my client for my server, im trying to add my custom made log-in box. i have added the right picture format, and size, and have added this into class30sub2_1_1

se if (s.equalsIgnoreCase("loginbox"))
{
try
{
				Image image = Toolkit.getDefaultToolkit().getImage("./Sprites/loginbox.png");			//System.getProperty("user.dir") + "\\"+i+".png");	
				anIntArray1439 = new int[anInt1440 * anInt1441];
				PixelGrabber pixelgrabber = new PixelGrabber(image, 0, 0, anInt1440, anInt1441, anIntArray1439, 0, anInt1440);
				pixelgrabber.grabPixels();
//System.out.println(s+ ".png "+ " hopefully loaded");
			}
			catch (Exception exception)
			{
				System.out.println(((Object) (exception)));
			}
		}

when i try using my client, it comes up with the regular runescape log-in box.

could you perhaps help me to make it to my new login box
